benchmark_details.name: ConCodeEval
benchmark_details.overview: ConCodeEval is a first-of-its-kind benchmark evaluating large language models for handling code constraints in domain-specific languages across various schema formats.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the effectiveness of large language models in generating and validating code adhering to schema constraints.

data.source: Synthetic generation of schema samples across various formats.
data.format: JSON, YAML, XML, Python, Natural Language

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the compliance of generated code with the specified schema constraints.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better compliance with schema constraints in generated code.
methodology.baseline_results: LLama3 and Granite models are used as baseline for comparison.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through compliance checking against schema validator tools.
